org.siggd
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  org.siggd.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
public class Game
extends Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

This class dispatches the main game loop (the Controller in MVC). A few things to note: InputProcessors registered with Input should *always* return false.

Author:
mysterymath
